segments.text: Did you hear who won the election ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m not happy about it , either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess the people wanted him as our new leader .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s the dumbest thing that I ’ Ve ever heard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to tell you something else that you probably won ’ t like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What could be worse than what you just told me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wasn ’ t serious , because Obama got elected .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s fantastic ! You really got me there .
segments.speaker: S2
